charaepi_ch0118_00_lillie/2301_1101_0100:
[Name:PlayerNickname ] found [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="his" F="her" ] way to a
glacier while adventuring across Pasio.
charaepi_ch0118_00_lillie/2301_1101_0200:
There, [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="he" F="she" ] was approached by Lillie, who was out
on an adventure of her own.
charaepi_ch0118_00_lillie/2301_1201_0400:
Isn’t this area beautiful? I’ve always wanted to
explore places like this, but I never had the
courage to do so until recently.
charaepi_ch0118_00_lillie/2301_1201_0500:
My experiences in Alola helped me find
that courage.
charaepi_ch0118_00_lillie/2301_1201_0600:
Now I feel like I can go anywhere with Clefairy
by my side!
charaepi_ch0118_00_lillie/2301_0401_0800:
Hehe! I hope we can have a lot more adventures
in the future, too!
charaepi_ch0118_00_lillie/2301_0402_1000:
Hehe! I hope we can have a lot more adventures
in the future, too!
charaepi_ch0118_00_lillie/2301_1201_1100:
Back when I was in Alola, taking my first steps
toward trying to become more courageous...
charaepi_ch0118_00_lillie/2301_1201_1200:
Hapu, one of the Island Kahunas, told me that no
one could call me lily-livered.
charaepi_ch0118_00_lillie/2301_1201_1300: In other words, I’m now ready to go all out!
charaepi_ch0118_00_lillie/2301_1201_1400:
I have to put all my effort in everything I do so I
don’t disappoint Hapu!
charaepi_ch0118_00_lillie/2301_1201_1500: Hah! There we go! The trap’s all ready now!
charaepi_ch0118_00_lillie/2301_1201_1600:
When Trainers in this area get caught in it, we’ll
swoop in and steal their Pokémon while they’re
wallowing about!
charaepi_ch0118_00_lillie/2301_1201_1700:
The more traps we set, the more Pokémon we’ll
be able to steal! Mwahaha! It’s perfect!
charaepi_ch0118_00_lillie/2301_1201_1900:
It sounds like those people are planning to
steal Pokémon!
charaepi_ch0118_00_lillie/2301_0401_2100: Yes, we do! Leave it to me!
charaepi_ch0118_00_lillie/2301_0402_2300: We don’t have time to get help!
charaepi_ch0118_00_lillie/2301_1201_2500:
Hold it right there! I won’t let you steal
people’s Pokémon!
charaepi_ch0118_00_lillie/2301_1201_2600:
What’s that, little girl? You lookin’ to get in
our way?
charaepi_ch0118_00_lillie/2301_1201_2700:
You’re seriously going to battle us with that tiny
Clefairy? Don’t make me laugh!
charaepi_ch0118_00_lillie/2301_1201_2800:
I am! If you refuse to stop what you’re doing,
that is!
charaepi_ch0118_00_lillie/2301_1201_2900: Clefairy and I will stop you no matter what!
charaepi_ch0118_00_lillie/2301_1201_3000:
Haha! Do you seriously think that the two of you
can stop us?
charaepi_ch0118_00_lillie/2301_1201_3100:
We could call in 20—wait, 50!—no, 100 of our
group members at a moment’s notice!
charaepi_ch0118_00_lillie/2301_1201_3200:
So what? I still can’t let you get away with doing
such a terrible thing!
charaepi_ch0118_00_lillie/2301_1201_3300:
Wh-what’s with her? How can she be
so confident?
charaepi_ch0118_00_lillie/2301_1201_3400: Maybe they’re actually a superstrong sync pair?!
charaepi_ch0118_00_lillie/2301_1201_3500: Ugh! Fine. We’ll let you go—for today, that is!
charaepi_ch0118_00_lillie/2301_1201_3600:
Oooh! I can’t believe they would try to use
Pokémon to do bad deeds!
charaepi_ch0118_00_lillie/2301_0301_3700: I guess we didn’t need help after all.
charaepi_ch0118_00_lillie/2301_0401_3800:
Oh, hehe, I guess you’re right. We should be
prepared, though, in case we run into bad guys
like them again.
charaepi_ch0118_00_lillie/2301_0302_3900: Was it OK to let them go like that?
charaepi_ch0118_00_lillie/2301_0402_4000:
Oh, maybe not. We should stay prepared
in case we run into bad guys like them again.
charaepi_ch0118_00_lillie/2301_1201_4100:
We need to befriend lots of sync pairs here
on Pasio...
charaepi_ch0118_00_lillie/2301_1201_4200:
so we can all come together to protect the
Pokémon here!
charaepi_ch0118_00_lillie/2301_1201_4300:
Hey, [Name:PlayerNickname ]...
If it ever comes down to just the two of us,
will you help me fight back against them?
charaepi_ch0118_00_lillie/2301_1201_4400: I promise to go all out!
charaepi_ch0118_00_lillie/2301_0401_4600:
Thank you! I feel like the two of us can take on
any challenge!
charaepi_ch0118_00_lillie/2301_0402_4800:
Thank you! I feel like the two of us can take on
any challenge!
